name: Stroll in the Mountains - a trash game
name_original: Stroll in the Mountains - a trash game
description:
‘Stroll in the Mountains’ is my trash game with a theme revolving around nature. As the title suggests, you are walking through valleys and finding your way to the end of the game, if you go through the “wrong route” there is an EPIC surprise on the end of that path. The large signs scattered around either help you or confuse you, and you decide what they mean. 

This is my first 3D Unity game created for a uni assignment. The game is literally meant to be a joke (hence trash game) so have fun and  take a stroll!
